name: Anh Tuan Luu
content: Anh Tuan's home page Luu Anh Tuan Associate Professor at NTU © Copyright © All rights reserved About me Hi! I am Luu Anh Tuan, an Associate Professor at the College of Computing and Data Science, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore. Before that, I was a postdoctoral fellow at MIT CSAIL and a member of the Natural Language Processing group under the supervision of Prof. Regina Barzilay from 2018 to 2020. I obtained Ph.D. degree in computer science from Nanyang Technological University in 2017. My research interests lie in the intersection of Artificial Intelligence and Natural Language Processing with the focus on applications of Large Language Models, Robustness & Trustworthy AI, Question Answering, Information Extraction, and Graph Neural Networks. Email: anhtuan.luu@ntu.edu.sg Office: N4-02c-86, College of Computing and Data Science, NTU Note: I am currently interested in taking new PhD students. Please feel free to contact me if you are very interested in deep learning and NLP. If you are one of the top students from a good university, there are many excellent PhD scholarships such as the AISG PhD Fellowship, Nanyang President's Graduate Scholarship, and IPP Scholarship. Note: I also have some positions for research fellows, research associates, and research assistants. If you have a strong publication record in NLP and AI and would like to do cutting-edge research in NLP, please feel free to contact me with your CV. Latest News Sep 2025: 3 papers accepted to NeurIPS 2025 Sep 2025: I have been promoted to Associate Professor with Tenure Aug 2025: 4 papers accepted to EMNLP 2025 Aug 2025: Invited to serve as Area Chair for ICLR 2025 Jun 2025: 1 paper accepted to Computational Linguistics May 2025: 10 papers accepted to ACL 2025 May 2025: 1 paper accepted to ICML 2025 Jan 2025: 4 papers accepted to NAACL 2025 Jan 2025: 1 paper accepted to ICLR 2025 Jan 2025: 1 paper accepted to Transactions on Machine Learning Research Dec 2024: Invited to serve as Area Chair for ICML 2025 Dec 2024: 2 papers accepted to AAAI 2025 Dec 2024: 1 paper accepted to COLING 2025 Nov 2024: 1 paper accepted to Expert Systems With Applications Nov 2024: 1 paper accepted to SAC 2024 Sep 2024: 4 papers accepted to NeurIPS 2024 Sep 2024: 9 papers accepted to EMNLP 2024 Publications For the full publication list, please refer to my Google Scholar page.
